phrs.translation: 猪般的, 猪一样的, 猪似的, 馋鬼

sentences.sentence: Also do not know who said that, say to eat nutritious, hey, I can always find this piece piggish highfalutin excuse.
sentences.translation: 也不知谁说的，说这样吃有营养，嘿，反正总能为这张馋嘴找到冠冕堂皇的借口的。

sentences.sentence: On China Swine, the 'spread' between buy and sell prices (part of the cost to trade) exceeded a piggish 40% last week.
sentences.translation: 就China Swine而言，上周其股票买入和卖出之间的差价（交易成本的一部分）超过40%。

sentences.sentence: Piggish table manners; the piggy fat-cheeked little boy and his porcine pot-bellied father; swinish slavering over food.
sentences.translation: 像猪一般的饮食方式；像猪一般的胖脸小男孩和他的猪一般大肚皮的父亲。
